name: Reign of pestilence (Covid-19 game)
description:
A game that puts you in the position of a king,reigning over a territory that just got infected with the coronavirus.This is a game made in 3 days as a submission for "Ayo bikin game" game jam.

Special thanks :

-Featuring Music by Matthew Pablo
-Hansjörg Malthaner (Sound effects)
-Gleamingscythe (Background)

Visit their works at :

http://www.matthewpablo.com

http://opengameart.org/users/varkalandar

https://www.deviantart.com/gleamingscythe
